# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-102">Răspunsul în Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-103">Pentru a răspunde la un mesaj la un moment dat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-104">În lista de mesaje, alegeți mesajul la care doriți să răspundeți.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-105">În partea din dreapta sus a panoului de mesaje, selectați</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-106">**Răspundeți** sau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-107">**Răspundetuturor**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-108">Tastați mesajul, apoi selectați **Trimitere**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-109">Pentru a răspunde automat la toate mesajele:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-110">Du-te la</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-111">**Setări** > **Vizualizați toate răspunsurile Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic** pentru a deschide setările de [răspunsuri automate](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-112">Selectați comutatorul **Activați răspunsurile automate**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-113">Selectarea casetei de selectare **Trimitere răspunsuri numai într-o perioadă de timp** vă permite să:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-114">Trimiteți răspunsuri numai când alegeți.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-115">Dacă nu setați o perioadă de timp, răspunsul automat rămâne activat până când îl dezactivați.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-116">Blocarea calendarului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-117">Refuză automat invitațiile noi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-118">Refuzați și anulați întâlnirile în această perioadă</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-119">În caseta de mesaj, tastați un mesaj de trimis persoanelor în timpul în care sunteți plecat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-120">Pentru a trimite numai răspunsuri persoanelor de contact, bifați caseta de **selectare Trimitere răspunsuri numai la persoane de contact.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-121">Selectați **Salvare**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1aa4d-122">Aflați mai multe despre [redirecționarea automată în Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1aa4d-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
